featureGroup.name: Digital Signage and Kiosk compact Player

feature.name: Price (based on mediaBOX-100)
feature.extra: Choose between the open source Linux / Ubuntu or Microsoft Windows. We do recommend Windows as you do get hardware acceleration, Live TV support and other benefits.

feature.name: Reliability
feature.extra: Both Windows and Ubuntu are extremely reliable and both OSs are powered by the SignageController so are sure to have a Player thatâ€™s up 24x7 with full remote management

feature.name: Optimized OS for SignagePlayer
feature.extra: Both units ship as Plug and Play devices and come with special baked OS (Ubuntu and Windows 7 Embedded) designed by MediaSignage engineers to deliver the best performance for you presentation. We also eliminate any OS balloon pop ups, firewalls warnings and other annoying Alerts. The unit is designed to just, WORK!

feature.name: Ships as a plug and play device
feature.extra: Unwrap the device, plug-in any screen, temporary keyboard and mouse, register the SignagePlayer with the same user name and password as your SignageStudio login, and you are done!

feature.name: Remote management
feature.extra: Windows and Ubuntu support live socket communication, remote snapshots and HTTP fall back

feature.name: Video hardware acceleration (HD)
feature.extra: W7e (Windows 7 Embedded) supports GPU hardware acceleration so High Definition videos are processed by the powerful onboard chipset and deliver super smooth HD H.264 video rendering

feature.name: Auto turn on after power outage
feature.extra: The W7e has a special BIOS feature allowing a daily turn ON and turn OFF . This will extend the lifespan of the unit and help save on overall power consumption.

feature.name: Live TV / Capture / Tuner
feature.extra: The mediaTV is an optional accessory (sold separately) that is supported only on the Windows W7e (Windows 7 Embedded) version and allow you to plug in Live TV from S-Video, composite, component, HDMI, Tuner card and other inputs. See here for more: http://mediasignage.com/html/mediatv.html

feature.name: Wifi booster
feature.extra: Stronger WIFI signal and no connection drops.

feature.name: External application and Power point
feature.extra: Configure external applications such as Power Point, VLC or other EXEs that can be embedded directly onto a specified screen division
